name: Who are you? (marclandes)
description:
Who are you is a space shooter where you are cannot control the kind of ship you are using (out of control :v). You would randomly take control of an enemy during the game.

Controls:

AWSD -> control movement of your spaceship

Mouse click -> shoot

All the art was created during the Jam (mostly using Aseprite)

The music was also created for this game but some sound effects were not:

https://freesound.org/people/jalastram/sounds/317749/

https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270343/

https://freesound.org/people/Shaun105/sounds/268168/

I also have used this font:

https://www.dafont.com/es/8bit-wonder.font
